snippet: Dr. West was a recovering alcoholic who became medical director of the Betty Ford Center in California.
abstract: James W West, surgeon whose struggles with alcohol led him to develop treatments for addiction, dies at age 98.
lead_paragraph: Dr. West was a recovering alcoholic who became medical director of the Betty Ford Center in California.

headline.seo: Dr. James West, Pioneer in Addiction Treatment, Dies at 98
headline.main: Dr. James West, a Pioneer in Addiction Study and Care, Dies at 98
headline.print_headline: Dr. James West, 98, Pioneer In Addiction Study and Care
